type: Moving Volume Average Price (MVWAP) - quantum Indicator

definition.text: Produce the average price of a set time period, taking into account the volume of trade over the same period of time

paragraphs.text: The moving VWAP takes into account the volume of trade over a set period of time. Unlike the standard VWAP, the value is never reset for each trading day, hence why it is called “moving”. There are 5 MVWAP of differing periods produced by this data mine.
There are five MVWAPs produced by this indicator, with the following periods: 5, 10, 20, 50, 100.
To change the parameters needed for the calculation as per your needs, locate and open the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under “MVWAP” Product Definition.

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| MVWAP | MVWAP | mvwap1, mvwap2, mvwap3, mvwap4, mvwap5 |
A basic strategy can be built by looking for a short period VWAP crossing above a longer one:
